question:
Recently, the union cabinet has given approval for India to accede to the protocol under World Health Organization Framework Convention on Tobacco Control (WHO FCTC). In this context, consider the following statements:
  1. WHO FCTC is the first international treaty negotiated under the auspices of WHO
  2. It aims to eliminate illicit trade of smoking as well as chewing tobacco products
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is correct</u>. WHO-FCTC is the first international treaty negotiated under the auspices of WHO. <u>Second statement is also correct</u>. The treaty aims to eliminate illicit trade of smoking and chewing tobacco products. The major objective of FCTC is to provide a framework for supply and demand reduction measures for tobacco control at the national, regional and global levels. Recently, the union cabinet has given approval for India to accede to this protocol. This initiative will help in strengthening comprehensive tobacco control in the country and in reduction in disease burden and mortality associated with tobacco.
